description:
Lyra`s Marill was stuck between two buildings and Ash`s Pikachu and Dawn`s Piplup rescued it just as Lyra arrived and introduced herself.
Maril is Lyra`s main Pok√©mon and it helped rescue Dawn`s egg from Team Rocket with its powerful Water Gun. It also uses its Water Gun as a location tracker by shooting it high in the air for others to see.
name: Maril (Kotone)
